page.title: 09Toys And Games
page.content: There are a lot of games played with a ball.Football and Netball are played with a large ball.Tennis,Rounders and Cricket are played with a small ball.Rounders and Cricket balls are very expensive.A small sponge ball is available so when you play outside you do not smash windows. Our computer is a Spectrum 48K it has got 40 buttons and you need a tape recorder with it.Some of the games that you can buy are Horace Goes Skiing,Chuckie Egg and Finders Keepers. 'My Little Pony'came on to the market in 1984 and cost about Â£4.There are baby ones,magic ones unicorn ponies and curly hair ponies.The names are Bowtie,Bubbles
